definition_en: The name of the Latin script letter A/a.
meanings_ja: 何人か, 何ものか (for "a person" or "a thing")
example: I want to buy a book. / 私は一冊の本を買いたい。

definition_en: Easy to use.
example: The doctor said she was able to undergo surgery. / その医師は彼女が手術を行うことを可能にした。

definition_en: Moving around; astir.
example: The book is about World War II. / 二元戦争についての本です。

definition_en: Another time; once more.
example: I'll try again tomorrow. / 明日もやります。

definition_en: (with a possessive pronoun) Everything that one is capable of.
example: I love all kinds of music. / 私は音楽全般が好きです。

definition_en: Prior to some specified time, either past, present, or future; by this time; previously.
example: I've already finished my homework. / 私の宿題はすでにできました。

definition_en: (focus) In addition; besides; as well; further; too.
example: I'll go to the store, and she will also go. / 私は店に行き、彼女も一緒に行く。

definition_en: At all times; throughout all time; since the beginning.
example: I will always support you. / 私はあなたをいつもサポートします。

meanings_ja: アメリカ人（一般的には、米国出身の人々を指す）
example: The American musician is very famous. / アメリカ人のミュージシャンは非常に有名です。

definition_en: One
meanings_ja: 一つの (ichi-no) - indicating a single unit or quantity
何らかの (nanra-ka no) - used as a indefinite article to indicate a singular noun
example: I'm going to the store for an apple. / 私はリンゴを買いに行きます。

definition_en: In rhythm, the second half of a divided beat.
example: I like reading books and watching movies. / 私は本を読み、映画を見ます。

definition_en: An additional one of the same kind.
example: I'd like to try another flavor. / 新しいフレーバーを試みます。

definition_en: To even the slightest extent, at all.
meanings_ja: 何者でも, なん든もの
example: I'll take any job available. / 私は何の仕事でも受けよう。

definition_en: Any person; anybody.
example: Anyone can learn a new language. / どんな人でも新しい言語を学べる。

definition_en: Someone or something of importance.
example: I'll take anything you give me. / あなたがくれたものを受けます。

definition_en: An accepted (but deprecated and rarely used) SI unit of area equal to 100 square metres, or a former unit of approximately the same extent. Symbol: a.
example: The sun are shining brightly today. / 今日は陽が強く輝いている。

definition_en: To such an extent or degree; to the same extent or degree.
example: I'll meet you as soon as I finish my work. / 僕の仕事を終わすと、すぐ会う

definition_en: To reply to or talk to someone, either online or face-to-face. (from the practice of targeting a message or reply to someone online by writing @name)
example: I'll meet you at 5 o'clock. / 5時に会いましょう。

definition_en: The rear of the body, especially the part between the neck and the end of the spine and opposite the chest and belly.
example: Can I get your back on this project? / そのプロジェクトの後ろを支えてくれないか?

definition_en: Error, mistake.
example: This movie is bad. / この映画は悪いです。

meanings_ja: なる (動作や状態を示す)
example: I will be there. / 私は orada いる。

definition_en: For the reason (that).
example: I went to the store because I needed milk. / 私は牛乳が必要だったため、店に行きました。

definition_en: A flying insect, of the clade Anthophila within the hymenopteran superfamily Apoidea, known for its organised societies (though only a minority have them), for collecting pollen and (in some species) producing wax and honey.
example: I have been to Tokyo many times. / 私は東京に何度も行った。

definition_en: At an earlier time.
example: I'll finish my homework before bed. / ボーイズルームの灯が消えるまでに宿題を済ませます。

definition_en: To accept as true, particularly without absolute certainty (i.e., as opposed to knowing)
meanings_ja: 想像する (in a figurative sense)
example: I believe in you. / 私はあなたに信じている。

definition_en: The supreme effort one can make, or has made.
example: This is the best movie I've ever seen. / この映画は、私の見た中で最高のものです。

definition_en: An entity, usually animate, deemed superior to another; one who has a claim to precedence; a superior.
example: This new smartphone is better than my old one. / 新しいスマートフォンは、私の旧機械よりよい。

definition_en: A kind of needle, shorter than a sharp, with a small rounded eye, used for making fine stitches on heavy fabrics.
example: The park is between my house and the store. / 私の家と店の間に公園があります。

definition_en: Someone or something that is large in stature
example: The big house on the hill was impressive. / 那個高い丘の上の巨大な家は印象的でした。

definition_en: Of great size, large.
example: What's the biggest challenge you've faced? / どんな最大の挑戦をされたの？

definition_en: Any of various bladed or pointed hand weapons, originally designating an Anglo-Saxon sword, and later a weapon of infantry, especially in the 14th and 15th centuries, commonly consisting of a broad, heavy, double-edged, hook-shaped blade, with a short pike at the back and another at the top, attached to the end of a long staff.
example: The hotel sent me a bill for $100. / ホテルは私に100ドルの請求書を送りました。

definition_en: A piece of metal placed in a horse's mouth and connected to the reins to direct the animal.
meanings_ja: .bit (コンピューターでの)情報の量 (e.g. 1 bit = 0 or 1)
example: I'll need a bit of sugar in my coffee. / コーヒーにはちょっとだけ砂糖が欲しい。

definition_en: The colour/color perceived in the absence of light, but also when no light is reflected, but rather absorbed.
example: The black car drove down the street. / 黒い自動車が通りを走った。

definition_en: The act or process by which something is built; construction.
meanings_ja: 建設、構築 (as in "building a relationship")
example: I'm going to the building to meet my friend. / 私は友達と会うために建物に行きます。

definition_en: A specific commercial enterprise or establishment.
example: I'm in the business of making money. / 私は金を稼ぐことが私の仕事です。

definition_en: An instance or example of using the word "but".
meanings_ja: contrario (正式には、対義語を示す場合)
example: I wanted to go to the beach, but it was raining. / 運命、雨で行くことができなかった。

definition_en: Something which is bought; a purchase.
meanings_ja: 何かに投資する (e.g. stocks, etc.)
example: I will buy a new phone tomorrow. / 私は明日新しい電話を買います。

definition_en: A flying insect, of the clade Anthophila within the hymenopteran superfamily Apoidea, known for its organised societies (though only a minority have them), for collecting pollen and (in some species) producing wax and honey.
example: I'll do it by myself. / 私が自分でやります。

definition_en: The position of a person or team in a tournament or competition who draws no opponent in a particular round so advances to the next round unopposed, or is awarded points for a win in a league table; also the phantom opponent of such a person or team.
meanings_ja: 最後は ( Informal way to say goodbye)
example: Say "bye" when you leave! / さようならと言って去ろう!

definition_en: A telephone conversation.
example: I'm going to call my friend to meet up tonight. / 私は今夜友人に電話をかけて会うつもりです。

definition_en: (heading) To use one's voice.
meanings_ja: 名前のついた (for a person or thing having a specific name)
example: She was called Sarah by her friends. / 彼女は友達からサラとして呼ばれていた。

definition_en: Used to indicate that the following event, period, or change in state occurred in the past, after a time of waiting, enduring, or anticipation
example: I came home late last night. /私は昨夜遅く帰宅した。

definition_en: A device for taking still or moving pictures or photographs.
meanings_ja: (photography) - This sense is more specific and related to the art of photography.
(optical instrument) - This sense is broader, referring to any type of camera-like device.
example: I took a picture with my camera. / 私はカメラで写真を撮影しました。

definition_en: (auxiliary verb, defective) To know how to; to be able to.
meanings_ja: 可能である, 実現可能
example: Can I go to the party tonight? / 私は今夜のパーティーに行けるの?

definition_en: An opportunity or possibility.
example: I got a chance to travel abroad. / 私は海外旅行の機会を得た。

definition_en: The process of becoming different.
meanings_ja: 交代する (in a context of taking turns)
example: I'm going to change my job. / 私は新しい職を探します。

definition_en: A situation in which the king is directly threatened by an opposing piece.
meanings_ja: 支払い (as in "to check one's account")
example: Can you check if this file is ready? / このファイルが準備できていますか？

definition_en: A large settlement, bigger than a town; sometimes with a specific legal definition, depending on the place.
example: The city is bustling with energy. / 都市は精力にあふれています。

definition_en: An end or conclusion.
example: The store will close at 5pm. / ストアは17時まで閉じます。

definition_en: Coming, arrival; approach.
meanings_ja: 来る (to arrive or to visit)
example: Come and see me tonight. / 今夜に来てください。

definition_en: To move from further away to nearer to.
meanings_ja: 到着する (arrival) / 発見される (to be discovered)
example: The new employee comes to the meeting tomorrow. / 新入社員は明日会議にやってくる。

definition_en: To move from further away to nearer to.
example: The new movie is coming soon. / 新映画は早く出る。

definition_en: A moderate or refreshing state of cold; moderate temperature of the air between hot and cold; coolness.
example: The cool breeze on a summer day was refreshing. / 夏の日に出会ったフレッシュな風はリフレッシュしました。

definition_en: (auxiliary verb, defective) To know how to; to be able to.
meanings_ja: 適切にすることができる
example: "I could eat a whole pizza by myself." / 私は一人で全てのピザを食べることができます。

definition_en: A sequence of events.
example: This course will help you improve your English skills. / この学習の道程で、英語力が向上します。

definition_en: The act of cutting.
meanings_ja: 切り離す (for physical cutting), 或いは (for emotional or psychological separation)
example: I had to cut my vacation short due to an emergency. / 休暇を短縮して緊急事態に応じねばならなかった。

definition_en: Abbreviation of declare.
example: The payment is due by the end of the month. / 期間内に支払いが必要です。
My friend Dave is a great artist. / マイ フレンデー ダベは偉大なアーティストです。

definition_en: Any period of 24 hours.
example: The sun is shining on this beautiful day. / はこの日が美しい日に_sunlight_

meanings_ja: 冬の最後の月 (mainly referring to the winter season)
example: I'll be on vacation in December / 12月に休暇に行く

definition_en: (auxiliary) A syntactic marker.
meanings_ja: した (主に過去完了形式を指す)
example: I did my homework. / 私は宿題をした。
I didn't go to the party. / パーティーに行ってない。

definition_en: A party, celebration, social function.
example: I will do my best. /私は一番の力を発揮します。

definition_en: (auxiliary) A syntactic marker.
meanings_ja: する (主に仮定的・疑問的な意味)
example: He does his homework every day. / 彼は毎日宿題をします。
She doesn't like coffee. / 彼女はコーヒーが好きじゃない。

definition_en: (auxiliary) A syntactic marker.
example: I'm doing my homework. / 私は宿題をやっている。

definition_en: Official designation for currency in some parts of the world, including Canada, the United States, Australia, New Zealand, Hong Kong, and elsewhere. Its symbol is $.
example: I need $100 to buy this gift. / これらのギフトを買うのに $100 が必要です。

definition_en: A university professor, particularly one at Oxford or Cambridge.
example: The don of the deal was made. / その取引は決着された。

definition_en: (auxiliary) A syntactic marker.
example: The project is done. / プロジェクトは完了です。

definition_en: A negative aspect; a downer.
example: I'm going down to the store. / 私は店に下ります。

definition_en: A shift (scheduled work period) that takes place early in the day.
example: I'm going to bed early tonight. / 今晩は早く就寝します。

definition_en: The third planet of the Solar System; the world upon which humans live.
meanings_ja: 地面（in the context of digging or excavation]
example: The earth is our home. / 地球は僕たちの家です。

definition_en: The terminal point of something in space or time.
example: The meeting will end at 5 PM. / 会議は午後5時に終わる。
I need to check every email that comes in. / 私は来るメールを全てチェックする必要があります。

definition_en: Every person.
example: Everyone loves ice cream. / 全員がアイスクリームを愛している。

definition_en: An organ through which animals see (perceive surroundings via light).
meanings_ja: 見る（視覚）, 記憶を持つ（心に留める）
example: The eyes of the tiger seemed to pierce through the darkness. / ティガーの目が暗闇を穿ちていたように見えた。

definition_en: Distant; remote in space.
example: The hotel was far from the city center. / はotelは, しいきようちゅうの からほど遠かった。
It's February, so I'm going to wear a coat. / それは2月だから、コートを着ます。

definition_en: Few people, few things.
meanings_ja: 限り少ない (when emphasizing the rarity of something)
example: I only have a few friends who like this movie. / 私はこの映画が気に入る友達が非常に少ない。

definition_en: The person or thing in the fifth position.
example: The fifth grade is very challenging. / 5番目の学年は非常に困難です。

definition_en: Fine champagne; French brandy.
example: The weather was fine yesterday. /Yesterday, the weather was wonderful.

definition_en: A slender jointed extremity of the human hand, exclusive of the thumb.
meanings_ja: 指に似た部分 (referring to small parts or details)
example: I can't believe my eyes - those tiny fingers are so delicate! / 私の目には信じられない - その小さな指はとても繊細ですね!

definition_en: A (usually self-sustaining) chemical reaction involving the bonding of oxygen with carbon or other fuel, with the production of heat and the presence of flame or smouldering.
meanings_ja: 火災 (in a broader sense, referring to a large-scale fire)
example: The firefighters rushed to put out the fire. / 火の消しに消防隊員が急いで駆けつけた。

definition_en: The person or thing in the first position.
example: This is my first job. / わたしはこれが私の最初の仕事です。

definition_en: The act of flying.
example: I booked a flight from Tokyo to New York. / 東京からニューヨークまでの航空券を予約しました。
I'm running for exercise. / 私は体を鍛めるために走っている。

definition_en: To encounter or discover by accident; to happen upon.
example: I found a new job. / 私は新しい仕事を見つけた。

definition_en: (not used in the plural) The person or thing in the fourth position.
meanings_ja: 最初の四分の一、最後の三分の二
example: The concert was the fourth show of the tour. / コンサートはツアーの4回目のショウでした。

definition_en: Used to indicate source or provenance.
example: The idea came from a book. / そのアイデアは本冊から来た。

definition_en: Containing the maximum possible amount that can fit in the space available.
meanings_ja: 満ちあふれる (machi afureru) - fully occupied or crowded
完全な (kanzen na) - complete or total
example: The hotel was full, so we had to book another one. /_hotel wa machi afureru kara, mō ichi no yūjō o kau ni shita._

definition_en: Amusement, enjoyment or pleasure
example: Having fun at the party was the best part of my week! / パーティーで楽しい時間を過ごしたのは私のお祝いの最も良い部分だった!

definition_en: A joke.
example: The comedian's funny jokes had everyone laughing. / コメディアンのユーモアなジョークがみんなを笑わせた。

definition_en: The time ahead; those moments yet to be experienced.
example: What's your future plan? / あなたの将来の計画は何ですか？

definition_en: Offspring.
example: I will get the book tomorrow. / 明日、書籍を手に入れる。

definition_en: (ditransitive) To obtain; to acquire.
meanings_ja: 突然の感動、興味を覚える (in a casual or informal sense)
example: I'm getting excited for my birthday party! / バースデーパーティーが楽しみですね!

definition_en: The act of going.
meanings_ja: 行く (iku) - To move in a certain direction
行う (okuru) - To take action or do something
example: I'm going to the store. / 私は店に行く。

definition_en: The act of going.
meanings_ja: 通じる、続く (in a figurative sense)
example: The bus goes down Main Street. / メインストリートを通って行くバス

definition_en: To move:
example: I'm going to the store. / 私は店に行きます。

definition_en: (of people)
example: This is a good movie. / これはよい映画です。

definition_en: (ditransitive) To obtain; to acquire.
example: I got a new job. / 私は新しい仕事を手に入れました。

definition_en: A person of major significance, accomplishment or acclaim.
example: The new roller coaster is great! / 新しいローラーコースターはとても良くて!

definition_en: To reach a partly (or totally) unqualified conclusion.
meanings_ja: おそれずに当てつける
example: Can you guess my favorite food? / あなたの好きな食べ物は何ですか？

definition_en: An effigy of a man burned on a bonfire on the anniversary of the Gunpowder Plot (5th November).
example: The guys were playing soccer in the park. / 男性たちは公園でサッカーをしていた。

definition_en: One of two usually roughly equal parts into which anything may be divided, or considered as divided.
meanings_ja: 一半 (more commonly used to refer to a portion or fraction)
example: The sandwich was cut in half. / サンドイッチは分半に切られた。

definition_en: To occur or take place.
example: It happened that I met her at the party. / パーティーで彼女と出会うことになった。

definition_en: A happy event, thing, person, etc.
example: I'm happy to be here. / わたしはここにいるのうれしい。

definition_en: To possess, own.
example: She has a dog. / 彼女は犬を持っている。

definition_en: A wealthy or privileged person.
meanings_ja: 経験する, 操作する (in a figurative sense)
example: I have a car. / 私は自動車を持つ。

definition_en: The game of tag, or it, in which the player attempting to catch the others is called "he".
meanings_ja: 自分の男性（特に第三者を指す場合）
example: He went to the store. / 彼は店に行った。

definition_en: (stative) To perceive sounds through the ear.
meanings_ja: 説明する (to give an explanation or interpretation)
example: I want to hear your explanation. / 私にはあなたの説明を聞きたい。

definition_en: Action given to provide assistance; aid.
example: I need help with this project. / このプロジェクトに手伝いが必要です。

definition_en: (abstract) This place; this location.
example: I'll meet you here at 5pm. / 5時ごろこの場所で会いましょう。

definition_en: An exclamation to get attention.
example: Hey, how are you? / こんにちは、元気ですか？

definition_en: A high point or position, literally or figuratively; an elevated place; a superior region; a height; the sky; heaven.
example: The high-speed train arrived on schedule. / ハイスピードの列車は時間通りに到着した。

definition_en: Honorific alternative letter-case form of his, sometimes used when referring to God or another important figure who is understood from context.
meanings_ja: (男性名詞所有形) - his car, his book などの所有形を示す。
example: His new phone is very useful. / 彼の新しい電話は非常に有用です。

definition_en: The aggregate of past events.
example: The museum has a vast collection of historical artifacts. / 博物館には歴史的遺物の膨大なコレクションがあります。

definition_en: To want something to happen, with a sense of expectation that it might.
example: I'm keeping hope that she'll say yes. / 彼女がいいえと答えることを願っています。

definition_en: A structure built or serving as an abode of human beings.
example: I'm going to my friend's house. / 私は友達の家行きます。

definition_en: The means by which something is accomplished.
example: How did you learn English? / あなたは英語をどのように学びましたか?

definition_en: The name of the Latin-script letter I.
meanings_ja: 自分 (in some contexts, such as emphasizing one's own thoughts or actions)
example: I like playing soccer. / 私はサッカーを好きです。

definition_en: An uncertainty, possibility, condition, doubt etc.
meanings_ja: conditionとして、かえって、仮定的に
example: If it rains, I will take an umbrella. / 雨が降ると、私は傘を携えて行きます。

definition_en: A position of power or influence, or a way to get it.
example: I am in the meeting room. / 会議室中私はいます。

definition_en: That which resolves uncertainty; anything that answers the question of "what a given entity is".
example: Can you provide more information about the project? / プロジェクトの情報を提供できますか？

definition_en: To engage the attention of; to awaken interest in; to excite emotion or passion in, in behalf of a person or thing.
meanings_ja: 対応する、取り組む (in a business or professional context)
example: I'm interested in learning more about this project. / 私はこのプロジェクトについてもっと学びたいと思います。

definition_en: To engage the attention of; to awaken interest in; to excite emotion or passion in, in behalf of a person or thing.
meanings_ja: また新しいやり方をしている、面白い
example: This movie was really interesting. / この映画はとても面白かった。

definition_en: To or towards the inside of.
example: I'm going into the city tomorrow. / 私は明日市内に旅行に行く。
She is a doctor. / 彼女は医師です。

meanings_ja: 現在進行中の状態を示す (e.g. "This isn't working.")
example: Is this your car? / この車はあなたのものですか？

definition_en: One who is neither a he nor a she; a creature; a dehumanized being.
example: It's a beautiful day. / それは美しい日曜日です。

definition_en: One who is neither a he nor a she; a creature; a dehumanized being.
example: Its flavor is amazing. / その味はすごいです。

definition_en: A juvenile male turkey.
example: My buddy Jake is coming over tonight. / マイバディージェイクが今夜来る。

definition_en: A hard black enamel varnish containing asphalt.
example: I'm going to Japan next month. / 私は来月、日本に旅行に行きます。
My friend's name is Jim. / マイ フレンドの 名前は ジム。

definition_en: Factually right, correct; factual.
example: I just finished my homework. / 私の宿題をただ終わった。

definition_en: A kilobyte (more formally KB or kB).
example: The key to success is hard work. / 成功の鍵は努力です。

definition_en: The main tower of a castle or fortress, located within the castle walls.
example: I will keep my promise. / 私は約束を守る。

definition_en: A type, race or category; a group of entities that have common characteristics such that they may be grouped together.
example: She's very kind to help me every day. / 彼女は私に何日も助けることが非常に純情です。

definition_en: Knowledge; the state of knowing.
meanings_ja: 調子が合う (informal, implies understanding or knowing someone)
example: I know her from college. / 私は彼女を大学時代に知っています。

definition_en: The part of Earth which is not covered by oceans or other bodies of water.
example: The pilot successfully landed the plane on the runway. / パイロットは滑走路に_planeを着陸させた。

definition_en: An old musical note, equal to two longas, four breves, or eight semibreves.
meanings_ja: ใหญく (used in informal settings or with young children)
example: The large company hired many new employees. / 大きな会社は新しい社員を多くの雇用した。

definition_en: A shift (scheduled work period) that takes place late in the day or at night.
example: I'm late for work. / 僕は仕事に遅れる。

definition_en: Near the end of a period of time.
meanings_ja: その後 (in this context, it implies a delay or postponement)
example: I'll meet you later. / 以後、私はあなたと会う。

definition_en: The body of binding rules and regulations, customs and standards established in a community by its legislative and judicial authorities.
example: The new law will take effect next year. / 新しい法律は来年から適用される。

definition_en: A smaller amount or quantity.
meanings_ja: より少ない, より少ない量がある
example: I have less money than before. / 元よりもお金が少なくなっている

definition_en: The allowing of possession of a property etc. in exchange for rent.
example: Can I let you try it? / 私にそれは試してみてください。

definition_en: A symbol in an alphabet.
example: Can I have a letter from my pen pal? / 私のペンパルから手紙をください。

English word: off

Meaning 1: 停止する
This meaning refers to stopping or ceasing something.

This meaning refers to separating or moving away from something.

Example sentence: She got off the bus at the last stop. / 彼女は最後の停留所でバスから降りた。

例文: The alarm clock went off in the morning. / 朝になってアラームクロックが鳴った。

example: "Thank you for your help!" / "お手伝いありがとうございます!"

definition_en: An expression of appreciation; a thought.
example: Thanks for your help! / その助けありがとうございます!

definition_en: Something being indicated that is there; one of those.
example: That book is my favorite. / その本は私のお気に入りです。

definition_en: With a comparative or with more and a verb phrase, establishes a correlation with one or more other such comparatives.
example: I'm going to buy the book / 私はその本を買う

meanings_ja: その人々の (referring to a plural group)
example: Their car is parked on the street. / 彼らの車は通り沿いに停車しています。

definition_en: (plural) Those ones.
meanings_ja: あれらの人々 (指物的なものをさす場合)
example: I'm giving a present to them. / 私は彼らに贈り物をやる。

definition_en: Used in comparisons, to introduce the basis of comparison.
example: "I'll meet you at the station then." / "私は駅であなたと会うことにする。"

definition_en: That place.
meanings_ja: 存在します、存在している
example: "Put the book over there." / 「それらの場所に本を置いてください。」

definition_en: The thing, item, etc. being indicated.
meanings_ja: あなたの、自分の (for "these" as "your" or "my")
example: I'll take these pens. / 私はこれらのペンを取ります。

definition_en: (the third-person plural) A group of people, animals, plants or objects previously mentioned.
example: They went to the park. / 彼らは公園に行った。

definition_en: That which is considered to exist as a separate entity, object, quality or concept.
example: What's the thing you're looking for? / 何を探しているのですか?

definition_en: That which is considered to exist as a separate entity, object, quality or concept.
meanings_ja: 問題、問題点 (mondai, mondaiten) - problems, issues
example: I have a lot of things to do today. / 今日は多くの物事がある。

definition_en: An act of thinking; consideration (of something).
example: I will think about it. / 私はそのことを考えるつもりです。

definition_en: Thought; gerund of think.
meanings_ja: 思考する (a more formal or abstract sense of thinking)
example: I was thinking about my future plans. / 私は将来の計画を考えていました。

definition_en: The person or thing in the third position.
meanings_ja: 第三の, 次の順序の
example: I came in third place. / 私は三位に位置した。

definition_en: Something being indicated that is here; one of these.
meanings_ja:
I'd be happy to help! 😊

meaning 1: このもの
meaning 2: 指定されたもの, 今いるもの

example: This is a book. / これは本です。

definition_en: (demonstrative) The thing, person, idea, quality, event, action or time indicated or understood from context, especially if more remote geographically, temporally or mentally than one designated as "this", or if expressing distinction.
example: Those who are willing to take risks are often more successful. / ああ、リスクを取る人々は成功率が高い傾向にある。

definition_en: To ponder, to go over in one's head.
meanings_ja: 想像 (in a creative or imaginative sense)
example: I had a thought about how to solve the problem. / 私はその問題を解決する方法について考えた。

definition_en: The digit/figure 3.
example: I have three apples. / 私は三つのリンゴがあります。

definition_en: A large slab of stone laid in a dry-stone wall from one side to the other; a perpend.
meanings_ja: ある期間中を行う (to do something during a certain period of time)
example: I'm going through a tough breakup right now. / 私は現在苦しい別れを通しています。

definition_en: The inevitable progression into the future with the passing of present and past events.
meanings_ja: 期間 (in a more formal or technical sense)
example: I don't have time to watch TV tonight. / Tonight にはテレビを見に行く時間がありません。

definition_en: The inevitable progression into the future with the passing of present and past events.
meanings_ja: 時刻 (時刻は、日時や時刻を指す場合に使用)
example: What are the times of the bus? / バスのは何時に発車するのですか？

definition_en: Toward a closed, touching or engaging position.
example: I'm going to the store. / 私は店に向かう。

definition_en: A current day or date.
example: I'm going to the store today. / 私は今日ストアにいく。

definition_en: Coherent; well organized.
meanings_ja: 一緒に (in a casual or informal sense)
example: We're going to the movies together. / 私たちは一緒に映画に行きます。

definition_en: (focus) Likewise.
meanings_ja: また、かつ (when used to indicate excess or too much)
example: I've had too many sandwiches. / 私にはサンドウィッチがまだ過ぎています。

definition_en: The highest or uppermost part of something.
example: The top of the mountain was covered in snow. / 山頂は雪で覆われました。

definition_en: An attempt.
meanings_ja: 尝す (trying something new or unusual)
example: I'm going to try this new restaurant. / 私はこの新しいレストランを試してみます。

definition_en: The digit/figure 2.
example: I have two dogs. / 私は二匹の犬を持っています。

definition_en: A grouping based on shared characteristics; a class.
example: What's your favorite type of music? / おまいのファイバータイプの音楽はなんだしょう?

definition_en: The name of the Latin-script letter U.
meanings_ja: その (meaning "that" or pointing to something)
example: What's up, u? / 何するの、君？

definition_en: To grasp a concept fully and thoroughly, especially (of words, statements, art, etc.) to be aware of the meaning of and (of people) to be aware of the intent of.
example: I don't understand what you mean. / 私はあなたが何を意味しているのか分からない。

definition_en: The direction opposed to the pull of gravity.
example: I'll pick you up from the airport. / アップルからairportを降ろす

definition_en: (personal) Me and at least one other person; the objective case of we.
example: The company is investing in us. / 会社は私たちに投資しています。

definition_en: To utilize or employ.
example: I used to play soccer when I was a kid. / 私は子供の頃にはサッカーを遊んでいた。

definition_en: Most of the time; less than always, but more than occasionally.
example: I usually go to bed early. / 私は通常早く就寝します。

definition_en: True, real, actual.
example: The food is very delicious. / 食べ物はとてもおいしい。

definition_en: Television, television show, movie.
meanings_ja: 動画、映像 (in the context of digital media)
example: I recorded a video of my family trip. / 私は家族旅行のビデオを撮影した。

definition_en: A delay.
meanings_ja: できるまで時間を置く
example: I will wait for you at the station. / ステーションでお待ちします。

definition_en: A desire, wish, longing.
example: I want to travel abroad. / 私は海外旅行に行きたい。

meanings_ja: 過去の状態や時期を示す (indicating a past state or period)
過去の進行形を示す (indicating a completed action in the past)
example: He was writing a letter / 彼は手紙を書いていた
I wasn't feeling well yesterday. / 昨日はなぜかイマイチ感じていませんでした。

definition_en: To look at, see, or view for a period of time.
example: I was watching a movie last night. / 昨晩は映画を見ていた。

definition_en: (heading) To do with a place or places.
meanings_ja: 方法 (hōhō) - means or method to achieve something
example: I'll find my way home tonight. / 私は今晩、自宅に戻る道を探します。

definition_en: (personal) The speakers/writers, or the speaker/writer and at least one other person (not the person being addressed). (This is the exclusive we.)
example: We are going to the movies tonight. /私たちは今夜映画に行きます。

definition_en: The short term state of the atmosphere at a specific time and place, including the temperature, relative humidity, cloud cover, precipitation, wind, etc.
example: The weather was nice today. / 今日は天気が良かった。

definition_en: Any period of seven consecutive days.
meanings_ja: 週間（週一週）, 時期（特に新しいことを始める時）
example: I'm going to start my new job next week. /私は来週、新しい仕事を始めます。

definition_en: In good health.
meanings_ja: 自分の心をくつがえる場所 (referring to a state of mind or mental well-being)
example: I'm feeling well today. / 今日はとてもうまく感じています。

definition_en: A man, a husband
meanings_ja: 条件的・仮定的な存在
example: If I were you, I would do it. / 私があなたであれば、私はそれはした。

definition_en: (Singlish) Used to contradict an underlying assumption held by the interlocutor.
example: What's your favorite food? / お好みの食べ物は何ですか？

definition_en: The time at which something happens.
meanings_ja: 何時、どの時 (depending on the context)
example: I'll call you when I arrive. / 私が着いたときに電話してきます。

definition_en: The place in which something happens.
example: I'm going to the party. Where is it? / パーティに行く。何処だよ？

definition_en: (interrogative) What one or ones (of those mentioned or implied).
meanings_ja: どのような (to describe something's characteristics)
その (to refer to a specific thing or person already mentioned)
example: I'm looking for a new phone, which is waterproof / 新しい電話を探しています、水が浸かるもの

definition_en: The color/colour of snow or milk; the colour of light containing equal amounts of all visible wavelengths.
meanings_ja: 純潔, 無塵 (in some contexts)
example: The bride wore a white wedding dress. / 新婦はウェディングドレスを白く着た。

definition_en: A person under discussion; a question of which person.
meanings_ja: その人 (referring to a specific person)
example: Who is going to the party? / どんな人かがパーティーに行くのか?

definition_en: Reason
example: Why did you quit your job? / なぜお仕事をやめたの？

definition_en: (now uncommon or literary) To wish, desire (something).
example: I will go to Tokyo tomorrow. / 私は明日東京に行く。

definition_en: Along, together with others, in a group, etc.
example: I'll go to the movies with my friends. / 私たちは友達と映画に行きます。

definition_en: The smallest unit of language that has a particular meaning and can be expressed by itself; the smallest discrete, meaningful unit of language. (contrast morpheme.)
example: "Can you repeat the word?" / "あの言葉を何度繰り返すと?"

definition_en: (heading) Employment.
example: I need to work on my project tonight. / 私は今晩プロジェクトを働かねばならない。

definition_en: (usually in the plural) Operation; action.
meanings_ja: 努力中 (in the midst of effort)
example: I'm working on a new project. / 新しいプロジェクトに取り組んでいる。

definition_en: Something that would happen, or would be the case, under different circumstances; a potentiality.
meanings_ja: 偏りある, 決心する
example: I would go to the movies if I had time. / 私は時間があったら映画に行く。

meanings_ja: 過去の仮定の表現（"if"節など）
example: I wouldn't go there if I were you. / 私はあなたがそこに行く価値ないと思います。

definition_en: Expressing joy, celebration, glee, etc.
example: "Do you want to go?" / "Yeah, I do." / 「行くのか？」/「はい、行く」

definition_en: A solar year, the time it takes the Earth to complete one revolution of the Sun (between 365.24 and 365.26 days depending on the point of reference).
meanings_ja: 時期 (when referring to a specific time period)
example: It's been five years since I graduated. /私たちは5年間卒業して以来です。

definition_en: A solar year, the time it takes the Earth to complete one revolution of the Sun (between 365.24 and 365.26 days depending on the point of reference).
example: I've been studying English for years. / 私は長い間英語を学んでいます。

definition_en: To address (a person) using the pronoun you (in the past, especially to use you rather than thou, when you was considered more formal).
meanings_ja: その人（informal, referring to someone specific）
example: What's your name? / あなたの名前は何ですか？

meanings_ja: あなたが関与するもの (e.g. responsibility, interest)
第三者に対し指示ある人物 (e.g. formal or polite address)
example: Your favorite food is pizza, right? / あなたの好物はピザですね？

definition_en: In an absolute or unconditional manner; utterly, positively, wholly.
example: "I absolutely love this cake." / "私はこのケーキを完全に愛しています。"

definition_en: (modal) In act or in fact; really; in truth; positively.
example: I'm not sure, actually. / 私は確かくないのです。

definition_en: In or to the front; in advance; onward.
meanings_ja: 先に位置する (in front of someone or something)
example: I need to plan ahead for my trip. / 私は旅行の計画を立てなくてはならない。

definition_en: To grant, give, admit, accord, afford, or yield; to let one have.
example: The teacher allows students to take a break. / Gakkyōsha wa gakuseki-tachi o takai yūdō ni moratte orimasu.

definition_en: Though, even though, in spite of or despite the fact that: introducing a clause that expresses a concession.
example: I like coffee, although it's not good for me. / 私はコーヒーが好きです、でもあなたのためにいいものではありません。

definition_en: To fill with wonder and surprise; to astonish, astound, surprise or perplex.
example: The fireworks display was amazing! / そのファイアーウォークディスプレイは 驚くほどのだった！

definition_en: The total, aggregate or sum of material (not applicable to discrete numbers or units or items in standard English).
example: The amount of money is enough. / 金額は足りる。

definition_en: Regardless; anyhow.
example: I'll get it anyway. / それは何でも取得する。

definition_en: Vigilant or on one's guard against danger or difficulty.
example: I became aware of the problem yesterday. / Yesterday, I realized that there was a problem.

definition_en: A living creature.
meanings_ja: 現象 (referring to a state or condition)
example: The human being is capable of great kindness. / 人間は偉大な親切さを持つ。

definition_en: In a lower place.
example: The package was stored below the stairs. / スタイルの下にパッケージは置かれました。

definition_en: In a way which is certain; with certainty.
example: I will definitely go to the party tonight. /私は今夜パーティに CERTAINLY 行きます。

definition_en: (manner) In a clear manner.
meanings_ja: 公平に、公正に (in a neutral or impartial manner)
example: The new policy will be implemented clearly on January 1st. / 新しいポリシーは明確に1月1日から実施されます。

definition_en: A spoken or written remark.
meanings_ja: 論述 (in a academic or technical context)
example: The comment section on the website was filled with opinions about the new policy. / ホームページのコメント欄は、新しい政策に関する意見が満ちていた。

definition_en: A team; a group of people who work together professionally.
example: Many companies are working together to reduce carbon emissions. / 多くの企業が炭素排を削減するために協力しています。

definition_en: A completed survey.
example: The project is complete. / プロジェクトは完全に終わった。

definition_en: (manner) In a complete manner
example: I'm completely exhausted. / 私は全く疲れきっています。

definition_en: The act of consulting together formally; serious conversation or discussion; interchange of views.
meanings_ja: 大会 (a large-scale meeting or gathering, often for a specific purpose or industry)
学術会議 (an academic meeting or conference)
example: We will hold a conference with our partners next week. / 我々は来週パートナーの会議を開催します。

definition_en: To puzzle, perplex, baffle, bewilder (somebody).
example: I was confused about what to do. / 私には何をしろか分からない。

definition_en: The act of congratulating.
example: "I'd like to offer my congratulations on your new job!" / 「新しい仕事を祝って、ありがとうございます!」

definition_en: An option allowing a gamer to resume play after game over, when all lives have been lost.
example: I'll continue my project this weekend. / 私は週末にプロジェクトを続けます。

definition_en: Expression and exchange of individual ideas through talking with other people; also, a set instance or occasion of such talking.
example: We had a great conversation about our travels. / 私たちは旅行についての会話を楽しくした。

definition_en: An insane or eccentric person; a crackpot.
meanings_ja: 非常に楽しい、興味深い
example: He's crazy about playing video games. / 彼はゲームが大好きです。

definition_en: Tending to ask questions, or to want to explore or investigate; inquisitive; (with a negative connotation) nosy, prying.
example: I'm curious about your new job. / あなたの新しい仕事について調べたいです。

definition_en: Full of danger.
meanings_ja: 悪質の、悪い (in a moral sense, e.g. "a dangerous person")
example: The hike was considered dangerous due to the steep terrain. / 登山道は急斜面で危険と評価されました。

definition_en: A division, a portion, a share.
example: We made a deal to meet at the park. / 我々は公園で会う約束を結んだ。

definition_en: A specification of an object or process, referring to requirements to be satisfied and thus conditions to be met for them to solve a problem.
meanings_ja: 概念 (gai setsu) - The main meaning of "design" is to create a concept or plan.
デザイン (dezain) - This refers to the process of creating a visual representation, such as an architectural design or a graphic design.
example: I designed a new logo for the company. / 私は企業の新しいロゴをデザインしました。

definition_en: Something small enough to escape casual notice.
example: Can you provide more details about the project? / プロジェクトの詳細を教えてください。

definition_en: A theoretical line (physically or mentally) followed from a point of origin or towards a destination. May be relative (e.g. up, left, outbound, dorsal), geographical (e.g. north), rotational (e.g. clockwise), or with respect to an object or location (e.g. toward Boston).
example: What is the direction to the nearest train station? / 最寄りの電車駅の方向は何ですか？

definition_en: Conversation or debate concerning a particular topic.
meanings_ja: 話し合い, 簡単な会話
example: The team had a thorough discussion about the project's deadline. / チームはプロジェクトの期限について徹底的に論議した。

definition_en: At a time in advance of the usual or expected event.
example: I'm leaving earlier today to catch the morning train. / 今日は朝の電車を乗り遅れるために前日に去る。

definition_en: (after a negative) As well.
meanings_ja: もしくは, それぞれ
example: Would you like to go either to the park or the beach? / パークかビーチかに行くのか好みますか?

definition_en: The terminal point of something in space or time.
example: The project's ends were achieved through hard work. / そのプロジェクトは努力により達成された。

definition_en: The "Enter" key on a computer keyboard.
example: She enters the contest. / 彼女はコンテストに参加する。

definition_en: (diminutive) An even number.
example: The cake is even better than I expected. / そのケーキは私が想像した以上に優れています。

definition_en: (manner) without approximation; precisely.
example: I need the instructions exactly as written. / 私は書きかけの指南に正しく従う必要があります。

definition_en: To stir the emotions of.
example: I'm so excited to go to the concert tonight! / 今夜のコンサートには嵐のように楽しみです!

definition_en: To predict or believe that something will happen
meanings_ja: 希望する (depending on the context)
example: I expect a lot of people to attend the concert tonight. / 今夜のコンサートには多くの人々が来ることを期待する。

definition_en: (heading) To use or experience the sense of touch.
example: I have a feeling that it will rain today. / 今日は雨が降る気がする。

definition_en: A final examination; a test or examination given at the end of a term or class; the test that concludes a class.
meanings_ja: 最後に決定的、最後の選択
example: The final result was announced. / 最終結果が発表された。

definition_en: At the end or conclusion; ultimately.
example: I've been waiting for hours, but we finally arrived at the party. / 私は長時間待っていたが、ようやくパーティーに到着した。

definition_en: An area of level ground.
example: The flat is in a good location. / このマンションは良い所在地にあります。

definition_en: To hit a fly ball; to hit a fly ball that is caught for an out. Compare ground (verb) and line (verb).
example: I love flying high in the sky. / 私は高い空に飛ぶのを愛します。

definition_en: To go after; to pursue; to move behind in the same path or direction.
example: The following instructions are crucial. / 以下の指示は大切です。

definition_en: Strength or energy of body or mind; active power; vigour; might; capacity of exercising an influence or producing an effect.
example: The company is using its marketing force to promote their new product. / その会社は新製品を売り込みのためにマーケティング力を使う。

definition_en: An extremely long time.
example: I will love you forever. / わたしはあなたを常に愛します。

definition_en: (heading, physical) To do with shape.
meanings_ja: 提案書、申請書 (in the context of official documents)
example: The company will fill out a form to apply for a loan. / その会社は融資のために申請書を提出します。

definition_en: One of the eight players (comprising two props, one hooker, two locks, two flankers and one number eight, collectively known as the pack) whose primary task is to gain and maintain possession of the ball (compare back).
example: I'll move forward with this project. /私はこのプロジェクトを進める。

definition_en: To help forward; to assist.
example: I'd like to go further in my studies. / 私は学習をもっと、またさらに進みたいです。

definition_en: A general fact or proposition; a generality.
example: The general manager is responsible for the overall strategy. /総括責任者は総体的な戦略を担当します。

definition_en: (ditransitive) To move, shift, provide something abstract or concrete to someone or something or somewhere.
example: She's always giving to charity. / 彼女は常に慈善活動に貢献している。

definition_en: Kyphosus vaigiensis, a fish found in southeast Asia.
example: The golden sunset was breathtaking. / 黄金の日暮れは breathtakingでした。

definition_en: The body with the power to make and/or enforce laws to control a country, land area, people or organization.
example: The government has implemented several reforms in recent years. / 現在、政府は複数の改革を実施しています。

definition_en: The way in which something hangs.
meanings_ja: 掴く (to hang up or put away)
example: I don't want to hang my shirt out to dry, it'll get wrinkled. / モンクレのシャツを干すのは不要、きれいにしない。

definition_en: To possess, own.
example: I am having trouble finding my keys. / キーの見つからないことがある。

definition_en: To provide assistance to (someone or something).
meanings_ja: 支援する, 援助する (both refer to providing support or assistance)
example: The volunteers were helping at the food bank. / ヴォランティアたちは食料銀行で手伝っていた。

definition_en: Very elevated; extending or being far above a base; tall; lofty.
example: The new apartment is higher up than our current one. / 新しいアパートは現在の ours より上にあります。

definition_en: To adorn or grace; to honour; to make becoming, appropriate, or honourable.
example: "I think she's an honest person." / 彼女は純真な人ですね。

definition_en: Very large.
example: The huge roller coaster was the main attraction at the amusement park. / 大きなローラーコースターは遊園地のメインアトラクションでした。

definition_en: A piece of source code or other content that is dynamically retrieved for inclusion in another item.
meanings_ja: 入れ込む (in a broader sense)
example: The company's product line will include new smartphones and tablets. / その会社の製品ラインには、新しいスマートフォンやタブレットなどが含まれます。

definition_en: In the place of something (usually mentioned earlier); as a substitute or alternative.
example: I'll take a book instead of a movie. / 私は映画よりも書籍を選む。

definition_en: A distinct physical object.
meanings_ja: 項目 (in a list or menu)
example: I need to purchase this item from the store. / その物品を店から購入する必要があります。

definition_en: Something of the smallest possible extent; an indivisible unit.
meanings_ja: よって、最も少ない (in a comparative sense)
example: I'll take the least expensive option. / はい、安くてもいいのを選びます。

definition_en: A tool for finding whether a surface is level, or for creating a horizontal or vertical line of reference.
example: The new software has reached the highest level. / 新しいソフトウェアは最高の水準に達しました。

definition_en: An act of lifting or raising.
example: I need to lift this heavy box upstairs. / より重い箱を上階に運ぶ必要があります。

definition_en: A military rank between captain and lieutenant colonel.
example: The major in her life was getting a good education. / 彼女の人生の大きな目標は、よい教育を受けることだった。

definition_en: A gathering of people for the purchase and sale of merchandise at a set time, often periodic.
meanings_ja: 市場 (経済) / 投資市場
example: The company is expanding its markets to Asia. / その会社はアジアに販売領域を拡大しています。

definition_en: A blemish.

質問や議論を行う、提案する
金額や値段を上げる (to increase the price)

I'd be happy to help! 😊

 Meaning 2: 表現 - hyōgen, 声明 - seiren (depending on the context)
